bladdr 0.0.8.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • using-pcr-functions

Generate visual library prep pcr quality control report

pcr_lib_qc.Rd

Generate visual library prep pcr quality control report

pcr_lib_qc(lib_calc_pcr, report_name = NULL)

Arguments

lib_calc_pcr

an output from pcr_lib_calc
report_name

filename of report to be generated (do not include file extension). Defaults to date-time of report generation.

Value

a ggplot

Examples


dat_path <- system.file("extdata", "untidy-standard-curve.xlsx", package = "bladdr")

pcr_tidy(dat_path, pad_zero = TRUE) %>%
        pcr_lib_calc() %>%
        pcr_lib_qc()
